exceptions.tactic: apply pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume in pt_PhaseOneResponded; auto; apply pt_PhaseOneResponded; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
i: Ordered.sort mid
this: Ordered.sort nat_ordType
tag: nat
m: seq nat
round: nat
from: nat
next_data: data
lg: Log
b: bool
pt: nid

Goal:
E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d : dstatelet => pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data lg b pt)

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
data = seq nid : Set
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
E_consume_external = fun (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (P : dstatelet -> Type) => coh d -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> ~~ internal_msg tag from this -> P d -> P {| dstate := upd this (loc this d) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} : dstatelet -> mid -> nat_ordType -> nat -> seq nat -> nat -> (dstatelet -> Type) -> Type Arguments E_consume_external _ _ _ _%nat_scope _%seq_scope _%nat_scope _%function
nid = nat : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
nat_ordType = OrdType nat nat_ordMixin : ordType
pt_PhaseOneResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (committed : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d), no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & if committed then pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt else pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOneResponded _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%bool_scope
pt_PhaseOneE_consume_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType), pt \in pts -> E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d0 : dstatelet => pt_PhaseOne d0 round next_data lg pt)
pt_InitE_consume_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from round : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nid), E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d0 : dstatelet => pt_Init d0 round lg pt)
pt_stateE_consume_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : nid), E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d0 : dstatelet => pt_state d0 ps lg pt)
cn_stateE_consume_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (cs : CStateT) (log : Log), E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d0 : dstatelet => cn_state d0 cs log)
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
msg_specE_consume_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (from' to' : nid) (tag' : nat) (m' : seq_eqType nat_eqType), internal_msg tag' from' to' -> E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d0 : dstatelet => msg_spec from' to' tag' m' (dsoup d0))
cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentAbort next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt else exists b : bool, pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneReceive _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentCommit next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt else pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l true pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseTwoRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : seq nat) (lg : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (this : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != this -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded {| dstate := upd this ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d r nd lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg b pt
this_not_pts : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
getStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> Log
getStLE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (l : Label) (this : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (N : this \in cn :: pts), loc this (getStatelet j l) = loc this (getStatelet i l) -> getStL pf' (cn_pts_in others N) = getStL pf (cn_pts_in others N)
getStCL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (l : Label) (this : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (N : this \in cn :: pts), loc this (getStatelet j l) = loc this (getStatelet i l) -> getStL pf' (cn_pts_in others N) = getStL pf (cn_pts_in others N)
cn_pts_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (this : nat_eqType), this \in cn :: pts -> this \in nodes cn pts others
pt_InitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt
getStL_Kp : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStL_Kc : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d r nd lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg pt
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d' e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
pt_state_soupE : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : soup) (h : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt n : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt != n -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} ps lg pt
nodes = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) => [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> seq nid Arguments nodes _ (_ _)%seq_scope

TPCCoh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes cn pts others])

msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
localCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (n : nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> seq nid -> nid -> Pred heap Arguments localCoh _ _%seq_scope
